entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:34 p.m. ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.8Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 along exposed areas of the coast. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
